content: 你这是在*nix 系统下吧？在win7下，config 文件的内容是这样的[core]repositoryformatversion = 0filemode = falsebare = falselogallrefupdates = truesymlinks = falseignorecase = truehideDotFiles = dotGitOnly[remote "origin"]fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*url =  https://github.com/redfish88/FamilyBill.git [branch "master"]remote = originmerge = refs/heads/master我尝试着在config文件里下手解决试试吧
name: redfish

content: 改ssh配置之后把   https://github.com/redfish88/FamilyBill.git  改成 https://my_github_alias/redfish88/FamilyBill.git 之类的就行了。可以添加多个remote比如 [remote "openshift] 格式照抄 origin 段落。然后就可以git push openshift了。
name: est

content: 怎么改ssh的配置？在win7下的.ssh 目录下没有找到config文件，只有ppk,github_rsa 文件
name: redfish
